sentences.sContent: He gotta go pole the pirogue down the bayou.
sentences.sContent_eng: He gotta go pole the pirogue down the bayou.
sentences.sCn: 他驾驶独木舟顺着密西西比河往下游。

sentences.sContent: Settle down far from town get him a pirogue.
sentences.sContent_eng: Settle down far from town get him a pirogue.
sentences.sCn: 给他弄艘独木舟，找个远离都市的地方安顿下来。

sentences.sContent: He ran for his life. He sprinted through the clover fields in front of his mansion toward the water, where he knew a pirogue lay on the levee.
sentences.sContent_eng: He ran for his life. He sprinted through the clover fields in front of his mansion toward the water, where he knew a pirogue lay on the levee.
sentences.sCn: 他现在是为生命而跑，他飞奔过庄园前的苜蓿地冲向河边，在那里的码头上有一条独木舟。

trans.tranOther: any of various kinds of dugout canoes
